name: Starvengers Star Dragon ship shooter
description:
Welcome to the Starvengers (Star Dragon) ship shooting game. The enemies have invaded earth, and it is up to you to take down the wave of enemies. 

Enemies: Controls: 

You can move your ship in any direction to shoot the enemy or to avoid enemy bullets.

*Run EXE file*

**Disclaimer**

I do not own the rights to the Starvengers or Star Dragon ship, or enemies. I am just a fan of the cartoon series, that I watched as a child.
